banner.toptitle: Do you have a vison ? Let's make it happen !
banner.text: Hotcodes is a web development company that provides cutting edge technology to make your business grow. We have a team of talented developers, designers and digital marketers who will help you to become better with our extraordinary services.

services.title: Our Unique & Awesome Core Services
services.text: At Hotcodes, we offer a comprehensive range of web development, mobile development, and digital marketing services to help businesses grow and reach their full potential. Our experienced team of developers and marketers use the latest technology and techniques to create custom solutions that meet the unique needs of each client.

marketing.title: Digital Marketing
marketing.text: Hotcodes provides comprehensive digital marketing services to help businesses reach their target audience and achieve their marketing goals.

quality.title: High-quality Design
quality.text: At Hotcodes, we offer high quality design services that can elevate the visual appeal of your brand.

webdev.title: Web Development
webdev.text: At Hotcodes, our web development service is centered around delivering high quality and innovative solutions to meet the needs of our clients.

optimization.title: Speed Optimization
optimization.text: Hotcodes provides top-notch SEO and speed optimization services that are designed to improve the visibility of your website and enhance its loading speed.

custom.title: Fully Customizable Apps
custom.text: Our Fully Customizable Apps service offers clients the ability to have complete control over the design, functionality and user experience of their mobile applications.

updates.title: Regular Updates
updates.text: We provide regular updates for all of its web and mobile app development services, ensuring that clients stay up to date with the latest technology and features.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Know all details about our company
about.text: We aim to build a fast growing companies by embracing the trends in the market and delivering high quality services in a highly competitive market.

text.title: Our Story and Goal
text.body: Hotcodes is a full-service IT company that provides a wide range of services including web development, mobile development, digital marketing, and high quality design. We are a team of experienced professionals dedicated to delivering top-notch solutions that meet our clients' unique needs and help them achieve their goals. Our goal is to provide our clients with the tools they need to succeed in today's digital landscape, and our commitment to excellence ensures that we consistently deliver high-quality results..

text.title: Our Dedication to Excellence: Our Mission to Revolutionize the IT Industry
text.body: Our mission at Hotcodes is to provide innovative and high-quality digital solutions to help businesses succeed in the ever-evolving digital landscape. Our goal is to help businesses grow by offering a wide range of services, including web development, mobile development, and digital marketing. We strive to deliver outstanding results that meet the unique needs of each of our clients and help them achieve their goals.

text.title: Shaping the Future of Technology
text.body: At Hotcodes, our vision is to be a leading player in the global IT market. We strive to deliver innovative solutions that make a real difference in the lives of our clients. We are dedicated to the growth and development of Africa and believe that technology has the power to bring about positive change.

team.title: OUR TEAM
team.subtitle: Meet With Our Creative Dedicated Team
team.text: Our team is comprised of highly skilled and experienced professionals who are dedicated to providing the best possible solutions to our clients. Our developers, designers, and marketers use their expertise to create innovative and effective solutions that meet the unique needs of each project.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Explore Our Latest Case Studies
portfolio.text: You can start building your new work portfolio with any of the projects or designs we have in our portfolio.

pricing.title: Pricing plans
pricing.subtitle: Affordable pricing with simple plans
pricing.text: hotcodes offer affordable pricing plans to fit your budget. In addition, we have a variety of payment options such as payment plans, monthly payments and other on-going payment options.
pricing.propositiontext: Contact our team to get a quote.

pricingplan.pricetext: Very affordable pricing that will not find nowhere else.

contactus.title: support
contactus.subtitle: Need any help say hello
contactus.text: Feel free to contact us for any help you need. We provide 24/7 customer support for our customers

cta.title: Looking for a collaboration ? Get Started today!
cta.text: We're working hard on innovating the way we do business. Join our collaborative community and be a part of the future of technology.
